para.text: The model has a single steady-state stress periods with a duration of 60 days and 120 time steps. Specify that in the "Model|MODFLOW Time" dialog box.

image.title: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of a single steady-state stress period.
image.caption: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of a single steady-state stress period.

para.text: You may ignore about the number of times steps when you close the dialog box.
